title: Serif Page Plus X5 v15.0.4.27 [MULTi]

English:
--------
Category: Software de Gestion 
Language: Multilingual 
Included medicine

Serif Page Plus X5 - a powerful professional editing desk. Want to create an advertising block or impose a printed edition sufficiently complex and rich in design? No problem! All this and much more can be done in the program PagePlus X5 - and that surely will agree that the editorial product is undoubtedly the best in its class. Brochures, books, magazines, pamphlets - PagePlus X5 quickly and easily from any problem. 

Key Features: 


* Over 1,000 professionally designed templates for different types of documents 
Word processing and powerful text formatting in a professional manner 
* Compatible with all common graphics file formats and text 
* Read, edit and export PDF files for viewing or printing a publication on the Internet 
Built-in digital photo editor with the study PhotoLab 
* Create and edit spreadsheets and calendars, including the import of databases and the use of formulas 
* Study Module to design logos Logo 
* Professional tools of typography and font support OpenType format 
* Special tools for the creation of a large volume of documents 
* On-line advice, video materials, and manuals 


The new X5 features: 


Pro OpenType Font support 
You get complete freedom in terms of typographic design documents with the fonts in OpenType format, iconic compositions include ligatures, fractions, ornaments and other special characters. 


New Management Lyrics 
Now you can place in the publications of cross-references and page numbers will be updated automatically as you work on the document. 


Improved PDF export 
Documents created in PagePlus X5, supports all types of PDF, so you can play professional printing anywhere in the world. 


Color Management 
Improved support for color profiles allowing us to achieve more accurate color reproduction and rich black tones become more diverse. 


Mixed page orientation 
By changing the orientation as needed individual pages, to simplify their tasks related to the design of large tables, charts, illustrations and other materials. 


Pathfinder sites 
Now you can not do a stroke of figures and objects, but also apply to the contours resulting from various effects, including transparency. Furthermore, we did Wrap text around images more accurate. 


Convenient document delivery 
Print dialog box more convenient to simplify the output documents, and an interactive preview window allows you to quickly make the necessary changes in case of error detection
